headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Booking Holdings (BKNG) Facing EU Scrutiny Under Digital Services Act
summary: In September 2025, the European Union initiated formal scrutiny of Booking Holdings to assess its efforts in combating online financial fraud, evaluating practices such as controlling fake listings under the Digital Services Act. This regulatory review introduces the potential for formal investigations and significant fines, signaling elevated compliance requirements for Booking Holdings as digital platform oversight intensifies across Europe. We'll examine how increased EU regulatory...
